messages.message: Hello, I'm Tetrix, your AI-assistant. You can upload PDFs and spreadsheets with information about your inventory, your supply chain or other relevant business information. I can assist you in pulling and making sense of data from those documents. Ask me anything and I'll do my best to help you.
Welcome! I'm here to help you with your business document inquiries.
Hi, I need assistance in analyzing my sales report.
Sure, please upload your sales report and let me know what insights you're looking for.
